## Example Quiz

<div class="quiz-single">
    <p>How much is 2+2?</p>  
    
    <li class="quiz-option">1</li>
    <li class="quiz-option">2</li>
    <li class="quiz-option">3</li>
    <li class="quiz-answer">4</li>
    
    <button class="quiz-submit">Submit</button>
    <button class="quiz-clear">Clear</button>
    <button class="quiz-show-answer">Show Answer</button>
    <button class="quiz-toggle-hint">Want a hint?</button>
    <p class="quiz-hint">Try decomposing 2 + 2 into 1 + 1 + 1 + 1.</p>
    
    <p class="quiz-explanation"><b>Explanation</b>: since 2 + 2 is 
    1 + 1 + 1 + 1, 2 + 2 is also 4*1, and, since any number times one is 
    the number itself, the answer is 4.</p>
</div>
